entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
